summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Plat 74W, page 175 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property at 7500 Seward Park Avenue South from Single Family 9600 (SF 9600) and Single Family 9600/Planned Unit Development (SF 9600/PUD) to Lowrise 1 (L1) and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Caroline Kline Galland Home, C.F. 298162).
